name: Space Horror Sokoban
description:
Hello there!

This is my entry for Ludum Dare 42, Space Horror Sokoban!

The theme was "Running out of space". I'll let you decide how well I complied with it.

Controls are:
WASD to move
Space to shoot
Mouse to click on UI

It is my first ever game jam, and all graphics and programming was done by me. Check out my page if you want to see more: http://lev3lgam.es/

That's it, have fun!
